EXODUS CHARTERING SERVICES., INDIA
TEL: 0091-44-26542962/69
EMAIL: chartering@exoduschartering.info
---------------------------------------------------------------
GOOD DAY
PLS OFFER FOR FLWNG DIRECT/CLOSE
M/V KW -----57K GRABBER -------------WILL OPEN CHITTAGONG ABOUT END AUG / EARLY SEPT
MV KING WIN (EX NAME MV JIN YUN)
BLT: MAY 31, 2012
FLAG: PANAMA, CLASS: RINA
DWT: ABT 56809MT ON 12.80M SSW
LOA: 189.99M BEAM: 32.26M
GRT/NRT: 32964/19142
5 HO/5 HA
GRAIN CAPACITY: 71634.1CBM
4x30MT CRANE + 4x8CBM GRAB（THE GRABS CAPACITY IS ADJUSTABLE TO 10CBM/12CBM）
SPEED/CONS AT SEA
ECO SPEED/CONS AT SEA
BALLAST: ABT 12.5 KNOTS ON ABT 24MT LSFO 380CST+ABT 0.1MT LSMGO
LADEN: ABT 12.0 KNOTS ON ABT 25MT LSFO 380CST+ABT 0.1MT LSMGO
AT PORT
IDLE: ABT 3.5MT LSFO 380CST+ABT 0.1MT LSMGO
WORKING: ABT 5.5MT LSFO 380CST+ABT 0.1MT LSMGO
BUNKERS SUPPLIED TO BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO-SPECIFICATIONS:
LSFO 380CST IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO 8217:2010 RMG380
LSMGO IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO 8217:2010 DMB
ALL DETAILS ABOUT
All speed and consumption figures are given basis good weather periods of 24 consecutive hours and
conditions defined as maximum Beaufort Scale 4, Douglas Sea State 3 with combined wave and swell
heights not exceeding 1.25 meters,without adverse currents and with vessel on even keel. Although speed
and consumption assessments are to be averaged over the entire period of employment,the first 12 hours
after commencement/end of sea passages as well as periods exceeding the defined good weather
definition herein are expressly excluded and no extrapolation can be made therefrom. It is agreed that
any saving in consumption to be off set against any reduction in speed or vice versa and that any saving
in IFO consumption shall be off set against any increased consumption of MDO/MGO or vice versa.
bunker saved at sea can be offset with more bunker at on/off hire bunker survey.
Vessel may consume MDO for M.E. during standby, when manouevering, in/out ports, rivers, crossing
channels,estuaries etc. and in narrow/shallow waters.
B.RGDS / MANUEL
MOB: 91-9840446665,
AS BROKERS ONLY
E. & O. E.
All details about and given in good faith.
SKYPE: manuel13291
This is email broadcast to shipbroking & shipping community and not spam. If you are not interested please notify us in return with subject "remove us"
*Treat hyperlinks and attachments if any in this email with caution.*
